channel.title: Posts on Vinayak Hora
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vinayak Hora

item.title: A Journey Around the World!
item.description: On Mount Kailasa, the divine abode of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati, their two sons—Kartikeya and Ganesha—grew under the watchful presence of the gods.

item.title: Why Lord Ganesha Is Worshipped First — A Vedic Perspective
item.description: A strictly Vedic explanation of why Lord Ganesha is considered first among all gods, with citations from classical Sanskrit texts.
